Encouraging eco-friendly practices within the supply chain is an essential step that companies can take to reduce their environmental impact and contribute to a greener future. By implementing these practices, companies can not only reduce their ecological footprint but also minimize risks associated with environmental non-compliance, improve their brand image and reputation, and foster goodwill among customers, employees, and stakeholders. Hopefully, more companies will follow the lead of Patagonia and make a sincere commitment to sustainability in their supply chain practices.
